labelsets.name: neurotransmitter
labelsets.description: Neurotransmitter assessed by markers including neurotransmitter transporters.

labelsets.name: Subtype
labelsets.description: Semi-automated annotation based on expression of curated sets of markers for particular neuron types. These annotations are more granular than those grouped under 'Class.'

annotations.rationale:
* Express Slc32a1, the vesicular GABA transporter, which also transports glycine
* Express Slc6a5 (GLYT2), the glycine transporter, which makes them glycinergic,

CORT is more specifically enriched in the neuronal cluster with the high NOS1 and NPY expression.
Without CORT, also labels some AVP+ neurons with low NOS1 and NPY expression.
